summary: Item 1. Business. Overview IDEX Corporation (“IDEX,” the “Company,” “we,” or “our”) is a global applied solutions provider serving niche markets with mission critical components for everyday life. Substantially all of the Company’s business activities are carried out through over 50 wholly-owned subsidiaries with shared values of Trust, Team and Excellence. IDEX’s diverse family of businesses is committed to making trusted solutions that improve lives and is innovative and inquisitive in its quest to solve customers’ most challenging applied technology problems.
